commitMessage:
@@@SOLR-4658: In preparation for REST API requests that can modify the schema.  a "managed schema" is introduced.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/lucene/dev/trunk@1463182 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

@@@ SOLR-10887: Append .xml to managed-schema file VERSION 2 (#279)

Managed schema file is now called "managed-schema.xml".  however there is a fallback to "managed-schema" since that is a common legacy name for the file.   Updated the name of the files used in running tests.
